text: Renato Steffen (born 3 November 1991) is a Swiss football player. He plays as a left winger for Lugano and the Switzerland national team. == References == Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Swiss footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:2022 FIFA World Cup players Category:Sportspeople from Aargau Category:People from Aarau
title: Renato Steffen
